verses.verse: It is reported <WG191> commonly <WG3654> that there is fornication <WG4202> among <WG1722> you, and such <WG5108> fornication <WG4202> as is not so <WG3761> much <WG3761> as named <WG3687> among <WG1722> the Gentiles, <WG1484> that one <WG5100> should have <WG2192> his father's <WG3962> wife. <WG1135>

And you are puffed <WG5448> up, and have <WG2192> not rather <WG3123> mourned, <WG3996> that he that has done <WG4160> this <WG5124> deed <WG2041> might be taken <WG1808> away from among <WG3319> you.

For I truly, <WG3303> as absent <WG548> in body, <WG4983> but present <WG3918> in spirit, <WG4151> have judged <WG2919> already, <WG2235> as though I were present, <WG3918> concerning him that has so <WG3779> done <WG2716> this <WG5124> deed,

In the name <WG3686> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> when you are gathered <WG4863> together, <WG4863> and my spirit, <WG4151> with the power <WG1411> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547>

To deliver <WG3860> such <WG5108> an one to Satan <WG4567> for the destruction <WG3639> of the flesh, <WG4561> that the spirit <WG4151> may be saved <WG4982> in the day <WG2250> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus. <WG2424>
Your <WG5216> glorying <WG2745> is not good. <WG2570> Know <WG1492> you not that a little <WG3398> leaven <WG2219> leavens <WG2220> the whole <WG3650> lump? <WG5445>

Purge <WG1571> out therefore <WG3767> the old <WG3820> leaven, <WG2219> that you may be a new <WG3501> lump, <WG5445> as you are unleavened. <WG106> For even <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> our passover <WG3957> is sacrificed <WG2380> for us:

Therefore <WG5620> let us keep <WG1858> the feast, <WG1858> not with old <WG3820> leaven, <WG2219> neither <WG3366> with the leaven <WG2219> of malice <WG2549> and wickedness; <WG4189> but with the unleavened <WG106> bread of sincerity <WG1505> and truth. <WG225>
I wrote <WG1125> to you in an letter <WG1992> not to company <WG4874> with fornicators: <WG4205>

Yet <WG2532> not altogether <WG3843> with the fornicators <WG4205> of this <WG5127> world, <WG2889> or <WG2228> with the covetous, <WG4123> or <WG2228> extortionists, <WG727> or <WG2228> with idolaters; <WG1496> for then <WG686> must <WG3784> you needs go <WG1831> out of the world. <WG2889>

But now <WG3570> I have written <WG1125> to you not to keep <WG4874> company, <WG4874> if <WG1437> any <WG5100> man that is called <WG3687> a brother <WG80> be a fornicator, <WG4205> or <WG2228> covetous, <WG4123> or <WG2228> an idolater, <WG1496> or <WG2228> a reviler, <WG3060> or <WG2228> a drunkard, <WG3183> or <WG2228> an extortionist; <WG727> with such <WG5108> an one no not to eat. <WG4906>
For what <WG5101> have I to do to judge <WG2919> them also <WG2532> that are without? <WG1854> do not you judge <WG2919> them that are within? <WG2080>
But them that are without <WG1854> God <WG2316> judges. <WG2919> Therefore put <WG1808> away <WG1808> from among yourselves <WG5216> <WG846> that wicked <WG4190> person.
